new_funds.title: Recent Fund Announcements
new_funds.description: New funds raised by investors relevant to cybersecurity and AI (actual investor activity)

signals.thesis: Boldstart Fund VII ($250M) announcement on LinkedIn - targeting AI founders at early/embryonic stages for autonomous enterprise

Boldstart Ventures Fund VII announced - $250M AI fund targeting early/embryonic stage founders building autonomous enterprise. Also celebrated Protect AI acquisition by Palo Alto Networks at RSAC2025.
Bessemer invested in Upwind Security - $250M Series B at $1.5B valuation for cloud security startup
Claroty raised $150M+ at $3B valuation - third mega round from Team8 portfolio (following Port.io $100M and Classiq $130M)

daily.executive_summary: Strong market momentum around AI agents and security convergence, with Ed Sim from Boldstart actively discussing AI agent skills security - directly relevant to KTLYST's agentic AI thesis. The cybersecurity funding landscape shows continued interest in AI-powered security solutions, while broader market data indicates 108% growth in AI spend, creating favorable conditions for AI security startups.
